text: guitar guy’s nice till his solos hit 2am 🙄
walls so thin can hear the whole 'it's britney bitch' ringtone saga next door
lol walls so thin hear neighbors typing 😑
drowning in tourists ≠ jewel status anymore
performers are cool but graffiti art adds real flavor
alleyways fulla historic graffiti here - quietly tells stories
man some alleyways here got crazy cool graffiti hidden like a secret exhibition only for those who wander off the beaten track, makes every walk feel like an art discovery tour!
rain just highlights those never-cleaned sidewalks here 🙄
budgets though? more like guessing games than anything planned - always something random popping up lol
retirement plans? nah just playing financial bingo over here
started giving mini art history lectures every time friends point out some random painting or sculpture, can’t help it – guess you could say my study habits are on display more often than not 😂

where i'm at people definitely get nosy around milestone ages but honestly think society's playbook 📚 feels outdated especially when you're busy hustling different priorities - like survival over settling down so quick.
art scene seems chill but still get some side-eye whenever i bring up less mainstream perspectives—it’s subtle but def there
art world has its subtle prejudices too
